pageContext.claim: “You look at the job numbers; you look at the companies pouring back into our country; you look at the stock market at an all-time high; unemployment, 17-year low.”
pageContext.analysis: This sentence is a mash-up of Trump's greatest hits: taking credit for jobs deals that predated his presidency, touting a stock market that he had called a "bubble" in the campaign and extolling unemployment figures that he had previously derided as phony.
